outputs.output_descr: The XIXth Meeting of the Parties to the Montreal Protocol in September 2007, through its decision XIX/6, adopted an accelerated phase-out schedule for HCFCs. The first control is the freeze on production and consumption of HCFCs from 01 January 2013, at the Baseline Level (average of 2009 and 2010 levels). The other control step are reduction of 10% by 2015, reduction of 35% by 2020, reduction of 67.5% by 2025, reduction  97.5% by 2030, allowance of 2.5% of baseline (annual equivalent) for period 2030-2040 and complete phase out by 2040.
